name: SideMV - Basic Sidecroller
description:
SideMv Basic is a fully customizable demo created on RPG Maker MV, which can be used to create your own sidescroller game. This demo is unique and versatile, suitable for creating sidescroller games with a strong focus on storyline and character animations, or more action-oriented games where the character can use different abilities.

The game engine is fully functional and allows for easy creation of sideview games, providing all standard features such as walking, running, and jumping.

With the help of the community, we could also develop special plugins to further support this game mechanic, which unfortunately represents a minority on RPG Maker.

I also want to express my gratitude to Galv and his plugins, without which this demo would never have been possible, or at least not in the way I imagined. Thank you, Galv, for your amazing work!

I am very excited to see the creations that the RPG Maker community will make using this demo. I have always been a big fan of sidescroller games, and that's why I decided to make this wonderful sideview world accessible to all of you.

Thank you for taking the time to read this submission. I look forward to hearing your thoughts and feedback on the demo, and I can't wait to share my new projects with you all in the near future!

Take care, game devs ;)
